name: Project: Rewind
description:
MADE IN 1 WEEK FOR THE FOURTH BRACKEYS GAME JAM!

Kevin is a young man with a strange power. In order to escape the lab where he is being experimented on, he must make the correct choices in a short five hours.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move

Enter/Return (while touching object) - Interact

Space - Continue Dialogue
